A channel for receiving messages. A receiver contains an ordered sequence of deliveries.
Conceptual overview Attach performative Detach performative Flow performative Transfer performative Disposition performative
The deliveries contained in this receiver.
Open the receiver.
Close the receiver.
The operation is complete when on-receiver-close fires.
Detach the receiver without closing it. For durable subscriptions this means the subscription is inactive but not canceled.
The operation is complete when on-receiver-detach fires.
Issue credit to the sending end. This increases the credit issued to the remote sender by the specified number of messages.
Request any messages available at the sending end. This tells the sender to use all existing credit immediately to send deliveries and then discard any excess credit.
The sending end is notified of the flush request by the *on-sender-flush* event. The operation is complete when *on-receiver-flush* fires.
